channel.title: Bloody Rs
channel.description:
Why do Jagex ban you ffs, it just sits in there database..
I know it's to stop you botting or what ever but still.

item.title: Bloody Rs
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

[quote=“ExtremeX-Scape™, post:8, topic:405730”][quote author=Kidpaparoach link=topic=502720.msg3678957#msg3678957 date=1311398425]

This thread is full of downs.

Fancy having an argument later how in my opinion your a ‘down’ and your rebuttal can be about how you think I’m a ‘down’?
I’d do it now but I need to sleep but I can’t pass this opportunity up as I love to trol.
You may be smart but when it comes down to it, you ain’t got nothing(I wanted to write nuffin but then I thought you’d grammar Nazi on my ass:/) on me.
[/quote]

What?[/quote]
I haven’t separated my statements clearly enough. Read them as if I were stating 3 different facts, that may help you understand what I meant.

  1. Asking for a argument as I took offense to the statement he made.
  2. The reason why I cannot argue with him just now.
  3. An insult to make me feel better

Read full topic

Asking why jagex bans you is like asking ‘why do cops arrest people?’…
